item.title: How to Set the Header/Footer in the Microsoft Notepad App (Windows 11)
item.description: This tutorial covers: 1. How to Remove the Header/Footer 2. How to Add the Header/Footer 3. What are the Header and Footer Codes? 4. How to Add Custom Words to the Header/Footer No time to scroll down? Click through this presentation tutorial: Watch a tutorial video: How to Remove the Header/Footer Step 1: First open a Notepad window. In the lower left click “More settings”. Step 2: In the menu that opens, click “Page setup”.
